attributes.title: This app is terrible
attributes.review: Who in their right mind decided to allow our no good orange mess of a President have an app that took me a time span of six years to download?! You’re telling me he can have an app that doesn’t open when I click it while hiding in the White House because he’s racist and scared? Also BLACK LIVES MATTER Mr. President!!! I hope you can find it in your heart to delete this atrocity of an app. The design doesn’t even go with my home screen wallpaper. The caucasity of this app to even take space up on my phone?!! I will not stand for it.

attributes.title: President Trump is going to go down in History for being the best president ever !
attributes.review: Honestly you should download this app though. If u want to know how to stay updated and current get the app. Let’s take back our country!

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: It took five whole days to download ,once opened all I could see was an orange screen wonder why? And to be quite honest that orange reminded me of racism and  how anti-everything good trump is and how he everything that is evil stems from people alike him. Might have to visit my therapist.

attributes.title: DO BOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: The app crashes all the time and kicks me out of the app. Not only that my phone started lagging so bad and I got a message from my bank telling me 20,000 dollars were sent to an anonymous keep in mind I dont have that money so I am now in debt THANKS DO BOR DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: Horrible Don’t even bother
attributes.review: This is app is horrible it took forever to download and I tried opening the app and I just said error this human is an error I agree with it of course but what the pint of the app. Don’t even bother like I said before I recommend looking for another app that supports people’s rights and equality not some Orange Cheeto

attributes.title: Great app
attributes.review: Let’s you know about updates and events. Also love seeing the snowflakes throw a fit over this! Trump 2020 🇺🇸#maga

attributes.title: Glitches/Helpful Information
attributes.review: So many glitches and technical difficulties. So many hackers on this app! Stealing ALLL of your information, yes your search history, yes on hidden browsers. Absolutely DRAINS your battery fully! I have to charge my phone every 20 minutes. I am 50 years old YES 50 and I despise this app! Do better trump campaign do BETTER. I now understand why such intelligent, genius, insightful, and caring Gen Z want to bring you down so badly. Terrible, Discusting, Excruciatingly, gargantuanly bad app.

attributes.title: Just...no....delete NOW. PLEASE
attributes.review: This is just....why. Please, for the sake of heck, delete this nightmare app now.

attributes.title: VERY,VERY,STINKY💨🤢
attributes.review: bruh i downloaded the app and i saw TROLL FACE. like BRUH, i got this app so i could support trump and i got TROLLED!!!!!! very angry. but wait that’s not all. an hour later i got a phone call, i picked it up and it said, 🍗chicken wing🍗chicken wing🌭hotdog and🍖bologna🐥chicken and🧀macaroni🥶chillin with my👬homies!!!!!! WHY WOULD IT SAY THAT!!!! i was so mad that it said that i put my phone in the microwave!!!!!!    🦧    i then had to buy a new phone, BUT THEY WERE OUT OF STOCK😠😡😠🤯🤬🤬😡😠😳🤥 i had to buy a SAMSUNG RF27T5501SG24 Cu.FT FRENCH DOOR REFRIGERATOR!!!🤯🤯🤯😤😭🧐😩😳🤮👹 i then dialed 773,202,LOONA on my SAMSUNG RF27T5501SG24 Cu.FT FRENCH DOOR REFRIGERATOR and asked them what i should do and they said. GET FREE WIFI ANY WHERE YOU GO!!!!!! and i thanked them for their wisdom. BUT IT WAS A SCAM 🕺🙅‍♀️🙅🙅‍♂️👎👎👎👎👎👎💀🤢🤮🤢🤮🥵😡😠😡😠🗿🗿🗿🗿🗿😡😠🤬🤬🤬🤬☹️☹️☹️☹️☹️☹️i got SO MAD i EXPLODED 🤯🤯🤯🤯🤯💥💥💥💥💥💥☄️☄️💥☄️🔥🔥🔥🎇🎇🎇🎇and that kids is how i met your mother
